cell-props.type: | Record<string, any>  | ((      data: Pick<        ItemKeySlot<any>,        'value' | 'item' | 'index' | 'internalItem' | 'column'      >,    ) => Record<string, any>)
cell-props.description: An object of additional props to be passed to each <td> in the table body. Also accepts a function that will be called for each cell. If the same prop is defined both here and in cellProps in a headers object, the value from the headers object will be used.
cell-props.description_zh: 要传递<td>给表主体中每个属性的附加属性的对象。还接受将为每个单元格调用的函数。如果此处和 headers 对象的 cellProps 中都定义了相同的 prop，则将使用 headers 对象中的值。

color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件 - 支持实用程序颜色（例如 success 或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在颜色页面上查找内置类的列表。

custom-filter.description: Function used to filter items, called for each filterable key on each item in the list. The first argument is the filterable value from the item, the second is the search term, and the third is the internal item object. The function should return true if the item should be included in the filtered list, or the index of the match in the value if it should be included with the result highlighted.
custom-filter.description_zh: 用于筛选项的函数，为列表中每个项上的每个可筛选键调用。第一个参数是项中的可筛选值，第二个参数是搜索词，第三个参数是内部项对象。如果项目应包含在筛选列表中，则该函数应返回 true，如果应在突出显示的结果中包含匹配项的索引，则该函数应返回 true。

custom-key-filter.description: Function used on specific keys within the item object. customFilter is skipped for columns with customKeyFilter specified.
custom-key-filter.description_zh: 用于 item 对象中特定键的函数。对于指定了 customKeyFilter 的列，将跳过 customFilter。

custom-key-sort.description: Function used on specific keys within the item object. customSort is skipped for columns with customKeySort specified.
custom-key-sort.description_zh: 用于 item 对象中特定键的函数。对于指定了 customKeySort 的列，将跳过 customSort。

density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.
density.description_zh: 调整元件使用的垂直高度。

expanded.description: Whether the item is expanded or not.

expand-on-click.description: Expands item when the row is clicked.

filter-keys.description: Array of specific keys to filter on the item.
filter-keys.description_zh: 要筛选项目的特定键的数组。

filter-mode.description: Controls how the results of customFilter and customKeyFilter are combined. All modes only apply customFilter to columns not specified in customKeyFilter.some: There is at least one match from either the custom filter or the custom key filter.every: All columns match either the custom filter or the custom key filter.union: There is at least one match from the custom filter, or all columns match the custom key filters.intersection: There is at least one match from the custom filter, and all columns match the custom key filters.
filter-mode.description_zh: 控制 customFilter 和 customKeyFilter 的结果组合方式。所有模式仅将 customFilter 应用于 customKeyFilter.some 中未指定的列：自定义筛选器或自定义键 filter.every 中至少有一个匹配项：所有列都与自定义筛选器或自定义键 filter.union 匹配：自定义筛选器中至少有一个匹配项，或者所有列都与自定义键 filters.intersection 匹配： 自定义筛选器中至少有一个匹配项，并且所有列都与自定义键筛选器匹配。

fixed-footer.description: Use the fixed-footer prop together with the height prop to fix the footer to the bottom of the table.
fixed-footer.description_zh: 将固定页脚支撑与高度支撑一起使用，将页脚固定到桌子底部。

fixed-header.description: Use the fixed-header prop together with the height prop to fix the header to the top of the table.
fixed-header.description_zh: 将固定标题与高度支柱一起使用，将标题固定到桌子的顶部。

group-by.description: Defines the grouping of the table items.

header-props.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

headers.type: {  readonly key?:    | 'data-table-group'    | 'data-table-select'    | 'data-table-expand'    | (string & {})    | undefined  readonly value?: SelectItemKey<Record<string, any>>  readonly title?: string | undefined  readonly fixed?: boolean | undefined  readonly align?: 'start' | 'end' | 'center' | undefined  readonly width?: string | number | undefined  readonly minWidth?: string | undefined  readonly maxWidth?: string | undefined  readonly nowrap?: boolean | undefined  readonly headerProps?: { readonly [x: string]: any } | undefined  readonly cellProps?:    | { readonly [x: string]: any }    | ((        data: Pick<          ItemKeySlot<any>,          'value' | 'item' | 'index' | 'internalItem'        >,      ) => Record<string, any>)    | undefined  readonly sortable?: boolean | undefined  readonly sort?: DataTableCompareFunction<any> | undefined  readonly sortRaw?: DataTableCompareFunction<any> | undefined  readonly filter?: FilterFunction | undefined  readonly mobile?: boolean | undefined  readonly children?:    | readonly {        readonly key?:          | 'data-table-group'          | 'data-table-select'          | 'data-table-expand'          | (string & {})          | undefined        readonly value?: SelectItemKey<Record<string, any>>        readonly title?: string | undefined        readonly fixed?: boolean | undefined        readonly align?: 'start' | 'end' | 'center' | undefined        readonly width?: string | number | undefined        readonly minWidth?: string | undefined        readonly maxWidth?: string | undefined        readonly nowrap?: boolean | undefined        readonly headerProps?: { readonly [x: string]: any } | undefined        readonly cellProps?:          | { readonly [x: string]: any }          | ((              data: Pick<                ItemKeySlot<any>,                'value' | 'item' | 'index' | 'internalItem'              >,            ) => Record<string, any>)          | undefined        readonly FilterFunction | undefined        readonly mobile?: boolean | undefined        readonly children?: readonly any[] | undefined      }[]    | undefined}[]
headers.description: An array of objects that each describe a header column.
headers.description_zh: 每个对象描述一个标题列的对象数组。

height.description: Use the height prop to set the height of the table.
height.description_zh: 使用高度道具设置桌子的高度。

hide-default-body.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

hide-default-footer.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

hide-default-header.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

hide-no-data.description: Hides the menu when there are no options to show. Useful for preventing the menu from opening before results are fetched asynchronously. Also has the effect of opening the menu when the items array changes if not already open.
hide-no-data.description_zh: 当没有要显示的选项时隐藏菜单。可用于防止在异步获取结果之前打开菜单。还具有在项目数组更改时打开菜单（如果尚未打开）的效果。

hover.description: Will add a hover effect to a table’s row when the mouse is over it.
hover.description_zh: 当鼠标悬停在表格的行上时，将向表格的行添加悬停效果。

item-height.description: Height in pixels of each item to display.
item-height.description_zh: 要显示的每个项目的高度（以像素为单位）。

items.description: An array of strings or objects used for automatically generating children components.
items.description_zh: 用于自动生成子组件的字符串或对象数组。

item-selectable.description: Property on supplied items that indicates whether the item is selectable.
item-selectable.description_zh: 提供的项的属性，指示项是否可选。

item-value.description: Property on supplied items that contains its value.
item-value.description_zh: 包含其值的已提供项的属性。

loading.description: Displays linear progress bar. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color or theme color - primary, secondary, success, info, warning, error) or a Boolean which uses the component color (set by color prop - if it’s supported by the component) or the primary color.
loading.description_zh: 显示线性进度条。可以是指定应用于进度条的颜色的 String（任何材质颜色或主题颜色 - 主要颜色、次要颜色、成功颜色、信息颜色、警告颜色、错误颜色）或布尔值，它使用组件颜色（由颜色属性设置 - 如果组件支持）或主要颜色。

loading-text.description: Text shown when the data is loading.
loading-text.description_zh: 加载数据时显示的文本。

mobile.description: Determines the display mode of the component. If true, the component will be displayed in mobile mode. If false, the component will be displayed in desktop mode. If null, will be based on the current mobile-breakpoint
mobile.description_zh: 确定组件的显示模式。如果为 true，则组件将以移动模式显示。如果为 false，则组件将以桌面模式显示。如果为 null，则将基于当前移动断点

mobile-breakpoint.type: number / xs / sm / md / lg / xl / xxl
mobile-breakpoint.description: Overrides the display configuration default screen size that the component should be considered in mobile.
mobile-breakpoint.description_zh: 覆盖组件在移动设备中应考虑的显示配置默认屏幕大小。

v-model.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the multiple prop, this defaults to an empty array.
v-model.description_zh: 组件的 v 模型值。如果组件支持多 prop，则默认为空数组。

no-data-text.description: Text shown when no items are provided to the component.
no-data-text.description_zh: 未向组件提供任何项目时显示的文本。

return-object.description: Changes the selection behavior to return the object directly rather than the value specified with item-value.
return-object.description_zh: 更改选择行为以直接返回对象，而不是使用 item-value 指定的值。

row-props.type: | Record<string, any>  | ((      data: Pick<ItemKeySlot<any>, 'item' | 'index' | 'internalItem'>,    ) => Record<string, any>)
row-props.description: An object of additional props to be passed to each <tr> in the table body. Also accepts a function that will be called for each row.
row-props.description_zh: 要传递<tr>给表主体中每个属性的附加属性的对象。还接受将为每行调用的函数。

search.description: Text input used to filter items.
search.description_zh: 用于筛选项目的文本输入。

select-strategy.description: Defines the strategy of selecting items in the list. Possible values are: ‘single’ (only one item can be selected at a time), ‘page’ (‘Select all’ button will select only items on the current page), ‘all’ (‘Select all’ button will select all items in the list).
select-strategy.description_zh: 定义在列表中选择项的策略。可能的值为：“单个”（一次只能选择一个项目）、“page”（“全选”按钮将仅选择当前页面上的项目）、“all”（“全选”按钮将选择列表中的所有项目）。

show-select.description: Shows the column with checkboxes for selecting items in the list.
show-select.description_zh: 显示带有用于选择列表中项目的复选框的列。

sort-asc-icon.description: Icon used for ascending sort button.
sort-asc-icon.description_zh: 用于升序排序按钮的图标。

sort-by.description: Array of column keys and sort orders that determines the sort order of the table.
sort-by.description_zh: 列键和排序顺序的数组，用于确定表的排序顺序。

sort-desc-icon.description: Icon used for descending sort button.
sort-desc-icon.description_zh: 用于降序排序按钮的图标。

sticky.description: Sticks the header to the top of the table.
sticky.description_zh: 将标题粘贴到表的顶部。

tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定用于根元素的自定义标记。

theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.
theme.description_zh: 为此组件及其所有子组件指定主题。

value-comparator.description: Apply a custom comparison algorithm to compare model-value and values contains in the items prop.
value-comparator.description_zh: 应用自定义比较算法来比较 model-value 和 items prop 中包含的值。

width.description: Sets the width for the component.

events.name: update:expanded
events.description: Emits when the expanded property of the options prop is updated.
events.description_zh: 在 options 属性的 expanded 属性更新时发出。

events.name: update:groupBy
events.description: Emits when the group-by property of the options property is updated.
events.description_zh: 在更新 options 属性的 group-by 属性时发出。

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Emits when the component’s model changes.
events.description_zh: 在组件的模型更改时发出。

events.name: update:options
events.description: Emits when one of the options properties is updated.
events.description_zh: 在其中一个选项属性更新时发出。

events.name: update:sortBy
events.description: Emits when the sort-by property of the options prop is updated.
events.description_zh: 在更新选项属性的排序方式属性时发出。

slots.name: [`header.${string}`]
slots.description: MISSING DESCRIPTION (edit in github)
slots.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

slots.name: [`item.${string}`]
slots.description: Slot for custom rendering of a row cell.
slots.description_zh: 用于行单元格的自定义渲染的插槽。

slots.name: body.append
slots.description: MISSING DESCRIPTION (edit in github)
slots.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

slots.name: body.prepend
slots.description: MISSING DESCRIPTION (edit in github)
slots.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

slots.name: bottom
slots.description: Slot to add content below the table.
slots.description_zh: 用于在表格下方添加内容的插槽。

slots.name: colgroup
slots.description: Slot to replace the default rendering of the <colgroup> element.
slots.description_zh: 槽来替换元素的默认渲染<colgroup>。

slots.name: data-table-group
slots.description: Slot for custom rendering of a group.
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义组渲染的插槽。

slots.name: data-table-select
slots.description: Slot for custom rendering of a header cell with the select checkbox.
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义呈现带有选择复选框的标题单元格的插槽。

slots.name: expanded-row
slots.description: Slot for custom rendering of an expanded row.
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义渲染扩展行的插槽。

slots.name: group-header
slots.description: Slot for custom rendering of a group header.
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义呈现组标题的插槽。

slots.name: header.data-table-expand
slots.description: MISSING DESCRIPTION (edit in github)
slots.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

slots.name: header.data-table-select
slots.description: MISSING DESCRIPTION (edit in github)
slots.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

slots.name: headers
slots.description: Slot to replace the default rendering of the <thead> element.
slots.description_zh: 槽来替换元素的默认渲染<thead>。

slots.name: item
slots.description: Slot to replace the default rendering of a row.
slots.description_zh: 槽来替换行的默认呈现。

slots.name: item.data-table-expand
slots.description: Slot to replace the default v-icon used when expanding rows.
slots.description_zh: 插槽，以替换扩展行时使用的默认 V 图标。

slots.name: item.data-table-select
slots.description: Slot to replace the default checkbox used when selecting rows.
slots.description_zh: 槽来替换选择行时使用的默认复选框。

slots.name: loader
slots.description: Slot for custom loader (displayed when loading prop is equal to true).
slots.description_zh: 自定义加载器的插槽（当加载道具等于 true 时显示）。

slots.name: loading
slots.description: Defines content for when loading is true and no items are provided.
slots.description_zh: 定义加载为 true 且未提供任何项目时的内容。

slots.name: no-data
slots.description: Defines content for when no items are provided.
slots.description_zh: 定义未提供任何项目时的内容。

slots.name: top
slots.description: Slot to add content above the table
slots.description_zh: 用于在表格上方添加内容的插槽
